ch.iserver.ace.net
Interface RemoteDocumentProxy

All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteDocumentProxyExt
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteDocumentProxyImpl
public interface RemoteDocumentProxy

A RemoteDocumentProxy is a network layer object that represents a document shared by another user. The join(JoinNetworkCallback) method tries to join the shared document editing session. The returned SessionConnection is used by the logic layer for communication with the session.

Method Summary
 DocumentDetails getDocumentDetails()
          Gets display information about the remote document.
 String getId()
          Gets the unique identifier of the document.
 RemoteUserProxy getPublisher()
          Gets the RemoteUserProxy of the publisher of the document.
 void join(JoinNetworkCallback callback)
          Tries to join the editing session of this remote document.
